sentences.en: Are smokers of marijuana more likely than non - users to abuse cocaine and heroine?
sentences.cn: 野生烟草的吸烟者比辱骂古柯碱和女英雄的 非用户 更可能 吗 ?

sentences.en: He was switched on after smoking some marijuana.
sentences.cn: 吸了几口大麻后，他兴奋起来了。

sentences.en: Marijuana is a kind of drug which does great damage to the human body.
sentences.cn: 线麻是一种毒品,对人体健康极为有害.

sentences.en: Others still view marijuana, like alcohol, as a largely harmless indulgence, dangerous only when used immoderately.
sentences.cn: 仍然其它人意见野生烟草, 象酒精一样, 作为基本上无害放任, 危险只有当无节制使用时.

sentences.en: Students rate their own schools , based on consumption of alcohol and marijuana, and other criteria.
sentences.cn: 《 普林斯顿 评论》则根据这些答卷列出了上述排名表.

sentences.en: Unfortunately, the US does not discriminate between hemp and marijuana, so growing it for food and fiber in this country is illegal.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，美国不区分毒品大麻和能量大麻，因此在该国把它添加它到粮食和用作提取纤维是非法的。

sentences.en: We never smoked marijuana; Di you smoke?
sentences.cn: 我们从来不吸烟; 你吸烟 吗 .

trans.tran_cn: 大麻，大麻毒品，野生烟草
trans.tran_en: an illegal drug smoked like a cigarette, made from the dried leaves of the  hemp  plant
